posts.post_content:
Would trade for any Series 3 Ft Worth players. If your card(s) are nicer than mine I would trade multiples of mine for your nicer Ft Worth cards.

Shipping is $3 for one. Check, Cash, Money Order, or PayPal are accepted payments. Regular PP add 3% to cover fees.

If you want 2 cards shipping is on me. If you want 3 or more shipping is on me and take 10% off. 

Series 1
Norcum-Augusta $35
Marshall-Columbia $25
Radebaugh-Columbus $35
Howard-Savannah $40

Series 2
Schrader-Danville $40
Rowe-Lynchburg $35
Sharp-Lynchburg $30
Lovell-Norfolk $30
Clunk-Portsmouth $40
Kirkpatrick-Portsmouth $35
Lawler-Richmond $20
Messitt-Richmond $20
Cefalu-Roanoke $30

Series 3
Spangler-Galveston $20
Williams-Waco $30

Series 5
Hicks-Greensboro $25
Thrasher-Greensboro $25
Stouch-Greensville $25
Walker-Spartanburg $25
Templin-Winston/Salem $25

Series 7
Steinback-Goldsboro X2 $25 each
Bump still looking to trade. If no takers I will add prices in a few days.
Would also trade for low end 54 Topps and 55 Bowman cards I need.
Bump, first post has been updated.

I would also do trades for the 27 cards I need to finish my 55 Bowman set. I am looking for fair to good condition cards 67, 167, 179, 201, 225, 235, 242, 250, 258, 259, 261, 266, 277 ,283, 285, 286, 291, 293, 297, 298, 302, 303, 307, 309, 311, 317, 320 If you have any or all of these and want to trade let me know.

EDIT: I also have several 1955-72 Willie Mays cards listed in the 1960-79 section. Would also trade them for the T210's or 55 Bowman cards I need.
